title: Asteroid Bennu samples contain mysterious ancient ‘space gum’
description: Scientists have discovered a material similar to gum or even plastic in the samples returned from asteroid Bennu. The research supports the theory that the asteroid Bennu was part of a long-lost watery world.

title: New Exhibition In Alula Reveals Shoots Of Globalisation First Sown In The Ancient City Of Dadan
description: (MENAFN - Mid-East Info) . Illuminating Discoveries – Uncovering the layers of Dadan's History' a new permanent exhibition opens in AlUla . Never before seen artefacts uncover a story of deep ...

title: Google plans to power a new data center with fossil fuels, yet release almost no emissions — here’s how its carbon capture tech works
description: Google is building a 400-megawatt natural gas plant in Illinois with carbon capture technology to trap 90% of CO2 emissions. Stored in the Mount Simon sandstone aquifer, the project aims to meet rising AI data center energy needs while minimizing climate impact.

title: The BB Lal influence on govt’s Project Mausam—‘archaeology is a study of networks’
description: At the 3rd BB Lal Memorial Lecture at IIC last week, speakers connected the late archaeologist's ideas to a govt initiative to trace old Indian Ocean routes and revive ancient connections.

title: New Study Debunks Theory of “Incestuous Royalty” Ruling Ancient Ireland
description: Evidence from Newgrange suggests ancient Ireland was more egalitarian than once believed, with no clear signs of a ruling elite despite the discovery of an incest-born individual in the tomb. New research is challenging earlier claims that an incestuous ruling class governed the people of ancient Ireland more than 5,000 years ago. Scientists reexamined evidence [...]
